Dituding Guardiola Doyan Diving, Sadio Mane: Mengapa Tidak?
07 Nov 2019, 07:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sadio Mane akhirnya membalas komentar Josep Guardiola yang menudingnya doyan diving dalam pertandingan. Mane hanya tertawa, menganggap komentar Guardiola sebagai angin lalu.
Akhir pekan lalu, Guardiola memulai psywar menjelang duel Liverpool vs Manchester City akhir pekan ini. Dia mengakui Mane pemain spesial, tapi juga menuding Mane sering diving atau berpura-pura jatuh.
"Terkadang dia diving, terkadang dia punya talenta untuk mencetak gol luar biasa di menit terakhir," tutur Guardiola kepada BBC Sport.
Tentu, komentar Guardiola ini memancing keributan. Jurgen Klopp tegas membantah pendapat Pep, bos Liverpool itu membela pemainnya.

Kali ini, Mane sendiri yang buka suara. Seperti apa? Scroll ke bawah ya, Bolaneters!

Guardiola accused of diving Diving, Sadio Mane: Why not?
Nov 7, 2019, 07:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sadio Mane finally replied to Josep Guardiola's comments accusing him of diving in the match. Mane just laughed, considering Guardiola's comments as the last wind.
Last weekend, Guardiola started a psywar ahead of the Liverpool v Manchester City duel this weekend. He admitted Mane was a special player, but also accused Mane of diving or pretending to fall.
"Sometimes he dives, sometimes he has the talent to score incredible goals at the last minute," Guardiola told BBC Sport.
Of course, Guardiola's comments provoked a ruckus. Jurgen Klopp flatly denied the opinion of Pep, the Liverpool boss was defending his players.
